title: Benihana offers three categories of nutritional information
statement: Benihana provides nutritional information in three categories: food (dine-in menu items), beverages (drinks), and catering (party platters).

citations.quote: Food: Nutrition facts for dine-in menu items including hibachi entr√©es, fried rice, appetizers, sauces, and more. Beverage: Calorie and sugar information for cocktails, beer, wine, sake and soft drinks. Catering: Nutritional info for catering orders and party platters
